long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
IG Growth Pro automatically boosts your followers and manages your following count, helping you grow your account and brand organically.

ğŸ’¡ Features
âœ“ Auto follow users' followings and followers.
âœ“ Auto follow likers and commenters on posts.
âœ“ Auto follow posters on hashtag and location.
âœ“ Auto unfollow users who don't follow you back (followed by this tool). It will remember them and allow you to unfollow them later.
âœ“ Auto unfollow users who don't follow you back.
âœ“ Auto unfollow users who you are following.
âœ“ Export followed/unfollowed users log to xlsx/csv. 

âš™ï¸ Get Started
1. Select Export type: 'Followers', 'Hashtag', 'Likes', etc.
2. Enter value.
3. Click the 'EXPORT' button.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
Your data privacy is paramount. All data processing occurs on your local machine; it never transits through our servers, ensuring no one else has access to your collected data.

ğŸ‘‹ Contact
For support or inquiries, reach out to us at lazytechofficial@gmail.com
